DOC.detailed_description: This study clinical trial , prospective , randomized double-blinded . Gabapentin oral 10 mg/kg administer reduce pain intensity well opioid consumption child 3 month 16 year submit unilateral limb surgery . The child divide 2 group : gabapentin group ( GG ) administer gabapentin 1 2 hour procedure ( N-40 ) placebo group ( GP ) administer placebo 1 2 hour surgery ( N-44 ) . Both group subject general anesthesia protocol , opioid free , femoral sciatic block bupivacaine 0.125 % . All patient receive dipyrone rescue analgesic use morphine 2/2h . The variable study age , gender , weight , type surgery , hemodynamics , postoperative pain morphine consumption .
